page.title: 08TYPICAL DAY OF AN 11 YR. OLD
page.content: I am a boy aged 11 years. I wake up at 08 00, put on my school uniform (grey shirt and trousers,green and silver striped tie,green jersey) go down stairs and feed my cat. After breakfast I walk from Park Lane to Otterbourne School. I cross the road with the lollipop lady and arrive at school at 08 40.I play until Whistle at 08 55, then go to my classroom and read until Assembly at 09 10. I am in the choir. We sing songs and say prayers. Then we have maths until playtime at 10 30. We play on the playground or the field. From 10 45 to 11 55 we work. The people who eat cooked school dinners eat first, the sandwich eaters have lunch at 12 35. The afternoon session is from 13 10 until 14 30. We might have P.E. We would change in our classroom and
